item.title: Opening Jupyter Notebook
item.author: limkiangteng@gic.com.sg (Lim Kiang Teng)
item.description: If you have not done so, set Chrome as your default Browser Open Anaconda Navigator Select either Jupyter Lab or Jupyter Notebook You will end up a page like this This page is a file browser that shows the files you have on your computer. Navigate to where you saved your notebook and open it.
